title: Choose Your Plan
subtitle: Plans for all special moments

comparison.title: Which option is ideal for you?
comparison.subtitle: Choose between single packages for special occasions or subscription for volume content production.

packages.title: Unique and Special Gift
packages.description: Perfect for birthdays, weddings, tributes and special moments that deserve a unique song.

subscription.title: Content in Volume
subscription.description: Ideal for YouTubers, TikTokers and podcasters who need multiple original songs every month.
features: Monthly songs for YouTube, TikTok, Podcasts

section.giftsDescription: Perfect for unique gifts: birthdays, weddings, tributes. Credits never expire!
section.creatorDescription: Original music in volume for YouTube, TikTok, Reels and Podcasts. No complex prompts, no editing - you describe, we create.

creator.title: Original Music for Your
creator.description: Forget complex prompts and manual editing. You describe, we create. Music ready for YouTube, TikTok, Reels and podcasts.
creator.subdescription: Unlike other AI platforms, here you don't need to master prompts or edit audio. Receive ready music, with curated lyrics and professional quality.

features.curatedLyricsDesc: Consistent musical identity for your channel. Each lyric is unique and personalized.
features.readyCoversDesc: Professional thumbnails included. Everything ready to publish directly in your videos.
features.humanSupportDesc: Lyric approval and adjustments with our team. You have full control.
features.readyToPostDesc: Songs, covers and everything ready to go live on your channels.
features.commercialUseDesc: 100% original and monetizable. Use on any platform without issues.

whyDifferent.title: Why are we different?
whyDifferent.weTakeCare: We take care of everything: composition, production, mixing and delivery. No learning curve, no complex tools. Professional music in up to 24h.

whyUs.title: Why creators choose us?
whyUs.noPromptsDesc: You describe in natural language, we make the magic happen.
whyUs.lyricsAndMusicDesc: Get curated lyrics and produced music. All ready, no extra work.
whyUs.fastDeliveryDesc: Professional music in up to 24h. No delays in your content production.

creditTypeWarning.title: Important about credits
creditTypeWarning.vocal: Credits from this plan are exclusive for songs with vocals. They cannot be used to create instrumentals.
creditTypeWarning.instrumental: Credits from this plan are exclusive for instrumental tracks. They cannot be used to create songs with vocals.

questions.a: Each credit allows you to create 1 complete song. In one-time packages, credits never expire. In Creator subscriptions, they renew monthly.

questions.q: Can I use the songs in monetized videos?
questions.a: Yes! The songs created are 100% original and you have all rights for commercial use, including monetization on YouTube, TikTok and Instagram.
No. Creator subscription credits renew monthly and don't accumulate. If you prefer credits that never expire, choose one-time packages.
Yes, you can cancel anytime. You continue with access until the end of the paid period and can use your remaining credits.

questions.q: What's the difference between One-time and Subscription?
questions.a:
One-time: Ideal for unique gifts. Credits never expire.

Creator Subscription: Ideal for content creators who need songs in volume every month, with much lower unit price.

customLyric.title: Already Have Your Lyrics Ready?
customLyric.description: Bring your own composition and we'll turn it into professional music at a special price!

footer.delivery: All plans include delivery within 24h directly on the platform and specialized technical support

errors.loginRequired: You need to be logged in to choose a plan.

toasts.subscriptionDescription: Your {{plan}} plan is active. Start creating!

seo.title: Plans and Pricing
seo.description: Choose the ideal plan to create your personalized music. Options from R$ 47.90 with delivery in up to 24h. Packages for vocal and instrumental songs.

choosePlan: Choose the ideal plan for you and start creating your personalized music now.
